name: Lena Martinez
role: Adrian's ex-girlfriend - represents human connection and what he's losing
core_wound: Father had schizophrenia - she spent childhood unable to distinguish his reality from delusion. Now hypervigilant about mental illness in loved ones.
wants: To save Adrian from what she perceives as psychosis
needs: To accept that some experiences are real even if incomprehensible - to trust Adrian
voice_markers: Warm but worried tone - like talking someone off a ledge
Uses Adrian's name frequently ('Adrian, please listen...')
References shared memories to ground him in reality
Medical language from years of dealing with her father's care
contradiction: Loves Adrian deeply but her trauma makes her interpret his Change as illness not transformation. Her caring becomes controlling.
physical_description: Expressive face - wears emotions openly. Curly brown hair often in practical ponytail. Casual artist clothes (she's an illustrator). Touch-oriented - reaches out to comfort but Adrian increasingly flinches away.

relationships.Adrian Keller: Dated for 2 years, broke up 6 months before story starts because of his emotional unavailability. Still loves him. His Change retraumatizes her.
relationships.Dr. Okonkwo: Allies in trying to 'save' Adrian, though their definitions differ
relationships.Sera Volkov: Sees as corrupting influence - the 'dealer' making Adrian's 'addiction' worse
